title: NoteAura — AI Knowledge Platform
description: Built a SaaS application enabling users to summarize PDFs, ask context-aware questions, and generate study material using LLMs. Implemented document chunking and semantic search with LangChain, designed role-based authentication and subscription workflows, and integrated Razorpay for payment processing.

title: ClickNBuy — E-Commerce Platform
description: Built a full-stack e-commerce platform with secure authentication and order management. Implemented PayPal and Razorpay payment gateways, designed REST APIs for product and order management, and built responsive frontend using React.

title: CodeMasters — E-Learning Platform
description: Developed an LMS platform with AI-powered doubt resolution and intelligent search. Supported 50+ active users with 100+ AI-assisted queries. Integrated Firebase authentication and built scalable backend services with Spring Boot.

title: TicTacToe AI — Browser Game
description: Built a browser-based game featuring an AI opponent using rule-based move prediction logic. Designed responsive UI and implemented game state management with vanilla JavaScript.
